title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 13
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 13:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Allender - The Wounded Heart; Hope for Adult Victims of Childhood Sexual Abuse, Rev. ed. (2008)

-  Althaus-Reid - Indecent Theology; Theological Perversions in Sex, Gender and Politics (2000)

-  Barry-Dee & Morris - Online Killers; Portraits of Murderers, Cannibals and Sex Predators Who Stalked the Web for Their Victims (2006)

-  Brooten (Ed.) - Beyond Slavery; Overcoming Its Religious and Sexual Legacies (2010)

-  Corona et al (Eds.) - Emotional , Physical and Sexual Abuse; Impact in Children and Social Minorities (2014)

-  Dean - Sexual Predators; How to Recognize Them on the Internet and on the Street, How to Keep Your Kids Away.. (2006)

-  Draucker & Martsolf - Counselling Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse, 3e (2006)

-  Dugard - A Stolen Life; a Memoir (2011)

-  Duncan - Sexual Bullying; Gender Conflict and Pupil Culture in Secondary Schools (1999)

-  Ellison - Boys Don't Tell; Ending the Silence of Abuse (2011)

-  Erooga & Masson (Eds.) - Children and Young People Who Sexually Abuse Others; Current Developments and Practice Responses, 2e (2006)

-  Erooga (Ed.) - Creating Safer Organisations; Practical Steps to Prevent the Abuse of Children by Those Working with Them (2012)

-  Ford - The Step Child; a True Story of a Broken Childhood (2006)

-  Fowler - A Practitioners' Tool for the Assessment of Adults Who Sexually Abuse Children (2008)

-  Gartner - Beyond Betrayal; Taking Charge of Your Life after Boyhood Sexual Abuse (2005)

-  Glass - Daddy's Little Princess (2014)

-  Green & Roberts - Helping Victims of Violent Crime; Assessment, Treatment, and Evidence-Based Practice (2008)

-  Itzin et al - Domestic and Sexual Violence and Abuse; Tackling the Health and Mental Health Effects (2010)

-  Jejeebhoy et al (Eds.) - Sex without Consent; Young People in Developing Countries (2005)

-  Kincaid - Erotic Innocence; the Culture of Child Molesting (1998)

-  Kinnear - Childhood Sexual Abuse; a Reference Handbook, 2e (2007)

-  Knight - Finding Me; a Decade of Darkness, a Life Reclaimed (2014)

-  Kramer - After the Lovedeath; Sexual Violence and the Making of Culture (1997)

-  Melrose & Pearce (Eds.) - Critical Perspectives on Child Sexual Exploitation and Related Trafficking (2013)

-  Miller - Crime, Sexual Violence, and Clemency; Florida's Pardon Board and Penal System in the Progressive Era (2000)

-  Muller & Wrangham - Sexual Coercion in Primates and Humans (2009)

-  Ollier & Hobday - Creative Therapy; Adolescents Overcoming Child Sexual Abuse (2004)

-  Pelzer - A Teenager's Journey, a Memoir; Overcoming a Childhood of Abuse (2006)

-  Plante - Bless Me Father for I Have Sinned; Perspectives on Sexual Abuse Committed by Roman Catholic Priests (1999)

-  Podles - Sacrilege; Sexual Abuse in the Catholic Church (2008)

-  Richardson & Bacon (Eds.) - Creative Responses to Child Sexual Abuse; Challenges and Dilemmas (2001)

-  Shuy - The Language of Sexual Misconduct Cases (2012)

-  The Case Against Cosby; Sex-Assault Allegations Recast Star's Legacy (2015)

-  USDJ - Sexually Transmitted Diseases and Child Sexual Abuse (2002)

-  Wagner - Sexual Harassment in the Workplace; How to Prevent, Investigate, and Resolve Problems in Your Organization (1992)
